title: MR less than MC, firm should reduce output

content.question: In a perfectly competitive industry, the market price of the product is $12. A firm produces at a level of output where average total cost is $16, marginal cost is $16, and average variable cost is $8. To maximize its profit, the firm should

choices.label: level both price and output unchanged

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model
